turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning. I was up all night working on that report? I really need some Starbucks. Can you grab a starbucks coffee for me on you way in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. which Starbucks would you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ugh. Doesn't matter. I guess the one closest to the Mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. you mean the one on Dekalb?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. 80 W Dekalb Pike King of Prussia, PA 19406

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea that's the one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Can I have a Tall Cafe Latte with Nonfat Milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah. No sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No but you are more than welcome to have a cup. It is on me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is so nice. But I'm on keto and can only have black coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh. man. Good for you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah. I've already lost 10 lbs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great! Keep it up. I'm sure they have something you can have thats sugar/carb free.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll check.. but I'm okay for right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thanks again. Don't forget to text me the reciept when you are done.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you in a bit.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See you soon.
